name: Jaime Shipes
text:
The service was fantastic!

We ordered a Pacific Rim pizza.  The manager suggested a pesto-based-sauce pizza ‚Ä¶More

name: Edwin Rodriguez
text: If you want a unique pizzeria experience, where the food are served in large quantities, and worth every dollar spent. I do not care for mushrooms, but this place will leave you full, satisfied and wondering if they have a location in your ‚Ä¶More

name: Randy Garmon
text: Very good pizza and cold drinks with indoor or out dining option. Perfect place for lunch while downtown.

name: Oli Zirka
text: So delicious üòã. And very good service ‚ù§Ô∏è

name: Daniel Dean
text: Great staff and amazing food! If you're in Montgomery, you should make a trip downtown to this Mellow Mushroom! When you go in, make sure to ask for Jacob at the bar and he will take care of you and keep you entertained.

name: Austin Richards
text: Great pizza place interesting beer. Try the peach Paloma if your looking for something to fight the heat and humidity. The service is kindhearted and attentive.

name: Linsey Adams
text: Good food. Large servings. Servers were awkward. We were brought 4 drink refills but had to make it a point to ask for napkins and silverware.

name: Beth Sorrells
text: Great food, great beverage selection,  great for kids, good for couples,  parties, nice location.  Love it

name: Artemus Mitchell
text: Service was great but does not have the old traditional Mellow Mushroom feel;  too commercialized

name: Dave Dunn
text:
Eat at the Mellow Mushroom.

This place was a unique experience that I did not regret. They had a nice range ‚Ä¶More

name: Tammy Jo Thompson
text: Food good as all mm's ive been to are. Service was aweful! Drinks were neglected knew nothing about menu or options asked for specific add ons when ordering and did not bring had to ask again. Two people at table ordered from bar and brought wrong  drinks. Sarah was not good taking care of us.

name: Jon Patton
text: Best server ever.  Food was great. Way better than any of the other localish mellow mushrooms :)

name: Chris Smith
text: Great food, cool atmosphere. Hopefully they have no trouble surviving this downturn.

name: Caleb Hennon
text: I really enjoyed going to this restaurant. The pizza was good, but, what really made this place great for me was our server. It was this dirty blond haired guy with long painted fingernails and he was awesome. We ended up having a decent ‚Ä¶More

name: Leo L. Young Jr.
text: Had a thin crust pizza. I do not eat pizza crust, ( never in my life, always leave it) but I ate this. Pizza was really good but the thin crust was best I ever had, anywhere.

name: Kristin Allen
text: This pizza was one of the best I've ever had.

name: Anthony Davis
text: Foods good. Nice local hang out stays open late

name: Ed Taylor
text: Good food and very personable staff

name: Gerald Barnesaustin
text: I love stopping in for a quick bite at the taco bus anytime I find myself in Huntsville. I don't know why being on a bus makes it better... but it does. You board the bus, go to the back and put your order in. There are a few seats inside ‚Ä¶More

name: Martha Glenn
text: Good food. Service was good. Servers had masks and tables seperated.

name: Johnny Law
text: We've been 3 times now and never been disappointed. Fantastic pizza and decent service by a somewhat young staff (generally younger staff have lesser professionalism.) So far, we have enjoyed ourselves each time and have no complaints. Not a home-run but a decent triple.

name: J Jenkins
text: This is one of me and daughters go to restaurant when is just us hanging out. To be a pizza joint, there is something about there wings that compete with a wing joint. Can never go wrong with there pizza crust which also serves as the pretzel dough.  Beer cheese dip ü§Ø

name: Ryan R
text: Great place to grab a bite to eat. Range of beers on tap. Cold and severed in frosted glasses. If you are in area drop by. Best service when Jacob or Will are behind the bar!!

name: David French
text: Quick, friendly service.  Food was delicious and well-presented.  Servers and staff were attentive throughout, and we enjoyed our meal very much.  I would definitely return here.

name: David Johnson
text: Pizza was very good and it always help to have a friendly staff!!

name: Kazmo Groove
text: I sat at the bar and ordered Aperol Spritz but they said they were not allowed to open a bottle of prosecco just for one order of Aperol Spritz. Okay, I understand. So I asked them make me an Aperol Negroni with gin instead. It was good. I ‚Ä¶More

name: Giselle LP
text: A must-visit for foodies visiting in Montgomery, AL. Unconventional, absolutely delicious and so welcoming. It would be right at home in Portland, San Francisco, Houston, NY or DC.

name: T. S.
text: Amazing experience! We came in as a group. Our waitress was spot on with service. Will definitely go back.

name: Taniqua Sizemore
text: Great food and great Atmosphere! Our server Debra was AWESOME and a few of the other servers remembered us from our last visit, which made my family and I feel AWESOME! Debra even played a few games with the kids while we waited for the rest of my family to arrive!! If you ever go ask for Debra!!

name: Willie Holmes
text: Was in Montgomery helping my wife decorate a wedding venue. After all the heavy lifting, I broke away and did a little site seeing and finished it with a visit to Mellow Mushroom. Always love their pizzas.  Second favorite pizza place in Columbus, GA. This one was good as well.

name: Barbie DeNisi
text: It's a little different vibe here then the other franchise mellow mushrooms. It's a good vibe-just different. I think it's because the decor is not as "busy." ‚Ä¶More

name: thomas branum
text: Ordered curbside pickup had no issues and as always great pizza.

name: A Ellis
text: Saturday afternoons at the outside bar enjoying the lovely downtown Montgomery

name: Jamie Mccracken
text:
Male bartender was nonchalant and we waited a very long time for order before we decided it would be faster to go home to get a drink.
However, the manager was great.

name: Gianna Anjanette
text: Absolutely delicious! And the Beer Cheese and pretzel bites? To die for!

name: Scott Suttle
text: Good food. Friendly staff.

name: Jeff Shoemake
text: Great food. Off menu ordering is welcome. Friendly staff.

name: William
text: The food is ok but disliked the paper straws overall.

name: Greg Gentry
text: My wife and I were downtown Montgomery for a concert and got there early. We decided to get a bite to eat and some drinks and decided on Mellow Mushroom. We had a Philly cheesesteak with mushroom sandwich (the whole one and each ate half) ‚Ä¶More

name: H Smith
text: If you have been to a mellow mushroom before you know the food is good. The good thing is most locations have a few items that arent available at other locations. We tried a few different things, everything was good.

name: Matthew Voke
text:
The pizza was good, the kids meal was alright.

The beer selection definitely needs improvement! One star off there. ‚Ä¶More

name: Todd Callahan
text: The burger I ate is delicious,  the service we got was awsome

name: Megan Branson
text: Overall pleased with this place. Interior was awesome, very interesting to look at, and always something new to point out. Pretzels were FANTASTIC, and the pizza was good.

name: Kelley Jacobs
text: Ordered the bruschetta. Absolutely delicious!

name: Nae Huffman
text: It‚Äôs supposed to be a cheese pizza but I think they forgot the sauce???

name: Steven Kershaw
text: Neat, hip location in downtown Montgomery. The pizza is good, and the extensive beer list is better. Worth a stop if you have never been to a Mellow Mushroom.

name: Barbie E
text: It's a bit subdued here. Pizza was as good as any other mellow mushroom. The bar area is pretty nice. The server didn't quite know how to interact with my toddlers. As a human, I found it comical. As a mom, I was sad for my babies because ‚Ä¶More

name: Josh Thom
text: Never been to this restaurant but it has the word ‚Äúmushroom‚Äù in its name and I detest mushrooms so it‚Äôs a one star review from me

name: Brian Bowen
text: One of my favorite pizza crusts around. Their lil Greek salads are very good as well. Our server was friendly and did a good job. The only problem we had was one person in our party didn‚Äôt get her food until everyone else was pretty much done.

name: Andre Firefighter Young
text: The food and football was great.

name: Matt Crawford
text: A little disappointed with this one in Montgomery.  In all fairness they were slammed pretty good this afternoon.  To add to that we had a party of nine.  I asked for a wait time and the hostess just walked away without a word.  When she ‚Ä¶More

name: Rodney Davis
text: Great service and quick too. Carston was a.wonderful server

name: Tracy Broughman
text:
Food is great like always .....service suck
He payed no mind to what we ask for. Oh wall .

name: Junior Herry
text: I had a good experience,  loved the stout

name: H Shafer
text: Awesome food! Wonderful service! Also some delightful gluten free options. I asked for mushrooms to be added to this gluten free Kosmic Karma and it is 10‚Äù of fabulousness! I am eagerly awaiting my gluten free brownie now. Also pictured is my son‚Äôs regular Holy Shiitake mushroom pie and he is enamored! Great place!!!

name: Devin McGowan
text: Great atmosphere and the service is amazing!!!

name: jellis_sojealous
text: Okay listen... the food here is delicious but the service and hospitality made eating here an experience. I traveled to Montgomery for work and was left wandering around when my hotel room wasn‚Äôt ready. I stopped in here because of the ‚Ä¶More

name: Squidd Inc
text: Got bbq chicken pizza. Was delicious. Also some pretzel bites. Everything was great

name: James Wallace
text: The sausage fest calzone was awesome. Great environment here.

name: Luis Nieves
text: Fantastic spot. Love the theme, atmosphere, art, and feel of this spot. Friendly staff, awesome food.

name: Chilli Bean
text: The first time I had eaten there,  they got my order wrong three times until the manager had to remake the entire order so we waited for over an hour until we could eat. The second visit the waiting time was long, even though the restaurant ‚Ä¶More

name: joel bolen
text: Calzone was really good. Pizza was good but a little greasy. My wife ordered an Italian sub that she didn't like at all. Tasted bland.

name: Greg Myers
text: Love the food and the service was on point.  Highly recommend!

name: matt velten
text: Good location and atmosphere,  friendly people and great pizza

name: elindborg
text: Very nice space and the quality pizza and salads you would expect from Mellow Mushroom.  Convenient location, nicer than typical MM space and the good food you expect from MM.  Great and quick lunch spot.

name: Nolan Sanders
text: Well after I ate there I was on the toilet with the most painful food birth of my life. I enjoyed the food, but I didnt enjoy the side effects. Not for the weak

name: Nora Henderson
text: We always have a great experience at Mello Mushroom! Great food, great service, a fun, friendly environment!

name: Rob Shearer
text: went there with kids, decent feed and good service in a relaxed central environment

name: Gabriel Posey
text: One of the better Mellow Mushroom experiences I have had. Good pizza, great service.

name: Elizabeth Garten
text: I love this place! I had lunch today, but usually stop by for Happy Hour. They have the absolute best Happy Hour in town! Beer and food specials every day from 2-6:30 every day.

name: Meghan Kelly
text: The food was great, but the service was very unorganized. Amazing beer list. Vegan options.

name: Altonio Branchman
text: Great food and a clean and healthy environment

name: tres b
text: Good food, decent service. Nice outside seating

name: Elisabetha Garcia
text: Its a must see! Its like a restaurant with museum art and sculptures in it. Loved the vibe and the staff was great. Kind of pricey but worth going to and seeing. Pet friendly with a cute outdoor seating area too. Definitely worth going to, at least for a drink!

name: Benjamin Grady
text: Very clean. Good food. Nice staff

name: garnerdaniel56
text: Clean restaurant and the food is standard mellow mushroom quality. That being said the wait was way too long for the food to arrive and we happened to have a waitress that was not very customer oriented and was just checking the blocks. She still was not bad just could improve. Over all I'd say they're an average store of the franchise.

name: Raymond Hadley
text: It wasn't the greatest pizza but it was pretty delicious for a chain. They accommodated our party of 150 people, excellent staff.

name: Jerry Lee Newell
text: Best Mellow Mushroom in town. The beer selection is awesome!

name: Emily Lobacz
text: Great service and happy hour!

name: Tracey Henderson
text: Best Mellow Mushroom pizza we have had. Much better quality and service than our other local location. I had a little salad and it was very large. Would have not been able eat all of it and my 1/2 slice of pizza if I had ordered a large one.

name: Sandy Rooney
text: Highly recommended!  Good food, sele6, and prices.

name: Brad Lee
text: My wife and I shared a small House Special pizza pie before seeing the Fab Four at the MPAC. The pizza was delicious and perfectly cooked. Our server, Jacob, was attentive and personable. They also had a large draft beer selection and I was able to enjoy a couple of my favorite IPAs.

name: Melissa Davis
text: A laid back atmosphere, the staff was very pleasant and the food is excellent! I would recommend this place to my friends.

name: Glenties Jacobs
text: Great food and good customer service by Debra

name: steve taylor
text: Good pizza and drinks.

name: Terry Chilton
text: Happy environment, nice open space, lots of windows. Lunch menu specials a very good value. Service was good but initially slow.

name: Amber Davis
text: Decent location. Took my favorite pizza off the menu but other than that the food is usually good.

name: Tara Smith
text: Great atmosphere, very chill and pleasant. My problem was with the server, this lady took FOREVER getting my drink. It was hot outside and I was thirsty. I looked in the window at her and she was laughing and talking with another server. I ‚Ä¶More

name: WillxIxAm x3x
text: Worst eighteen dollars I've ever spent. The waitress is the only reason I'm giving more than 1 star.... Because my food was terrible. The steak calzone I ordered was burnt on the bottom (which created an awful aftertaste),  the steak was ‚Ä¶More

name: Douglas Bell
text: It's good! The bar has a good vibe. Pizza is on par with other MMs I've been to.

name: Tomasina Garner
text: I always love the vibe of this place, but the food today was just okay.  Our waitress was also just okay. The rest of the staff were friendly though.

name: Brad Orme
text: Always great pizza and a friendly bartender at this one in Montgomery.  Nice beer selection and super convenient to the convention center

name: Dave Campbell
text: Beer and good company.  It's a great place to unwind and have good conversation.

name: Bradford
text: I had the mushroom soup, which was great albeit a small portion. The wings were also good, but small.

name: Jennifer Lea Pumphrey
text: Great sandwhiches, pizzas and REALLY good cookies. I would deff recommend the peanut butter cookie. Mmm mm mmm.

name: Emily Pietrowski
text: The huge glowing sign outside says Pie Bar. They meant pizza. They have no pie. None. I am betrayed.

name: Michael
text: This is my second time visiting this location and both times were awesome. This last time was perhaps one of the best examples of customer service I can remember in a while that I've had at ANY restaurant. Sage was our server and she was ‚Ä¶More

name: Spartacus Roosevelt
text: It's mellow mushroom. It's fine and beats a lot of chain pizza places.

name: Maggie McCoy
text: The food is always good here, just like any other Mellow Mushroom. However, the service and situation tonight leaves some room for improvement. I didnt hear 100% of the conversation proceeding this incident but one of the patrons got ‚Ä¶More

name: Carrie Stark
text: Very friendly staff, good atmosphere. I go there for the gluten free pizza. It is very good.

name: Stephanie Stubbs
text: A little pricey, but great food. Loved the mushroom soup.

name: Cy'ruin Sorian
text: The food is good, but don't bother unless you have an hour long lunch break.

name: Ignite InspiredWellness
text: I enjoyed the food and funky atmosphere.

name: Shannon Horsley
text: I called and reserved a time for my twins birthday. From the moment we arrived we had the best service anyone can ask for. I have been to our other local MM and had the worst experiences. To the point where I was dreading going but went ‚Ä¶More

name: Greg J
text: Came in from out of town to go to a wedding. Had nobody checking on us after being seated. Ended up walking out after ordering drinks and sitting for 30+ minutes

name: Melissa Jennings
text: Great food, atmosphere & location.

name: Aishia Henderson
text: The mushroom soup is outstanding! A wonderful appetizer that fills you up. The Kalua and cream cocktail is quite tasty!

name: Kiara Thiam
text: Old reliable for my family (including 2 picky toddlers). The pizza is always good and the service excellent. My husband was a little disappointed in the wings. He said the wings at the Auburn location were better, but overall we enjoyed it and will be frequenting again.

name: sean parker
text: Normally we would have left a great review due to our love of the mellow but today was a bad experience within the 5 second interaction we had w their staff. We were traveling out of town with our two young children one of which is an 11 ‚Ä¶More

name: KalElSith
text: Fantastic pizza with a large variety. Definitely in my top 5 favorite pizza restaurants.

name: Carin Atkins
text: Great service and good food. It was great for the weekend and located in a trendy area

name: Sulai Issa
text: Great service and a good vegan selection.

name: Montrez Starr
text: Mellowmushroom's Happy Hour time is great  and they have  good food choice but the bar help needs to be more savvy of drinks and how to make them.

name: Joseph Childers
text: Great food great staff and great environment would definitely recommend this place

name: Brandon Blevins
text: First time going to Mellow Mushroom and they had good pizza and great customer service, they labeled my list of food and helped me carry it to my car.

name: Elena Cameron
text: Visiting AL and everyone recommended this place. I was not disappointed! The place is so cute. The staff is so welcoming and hilarious. Food and drinks were delicious. I wish there was one in CO to go to when my vacation is over here!

name: Mitchell Maund
text: Good pizza. Good salad. Nice atmosphere.

name: Shannon McNabb
text: Pizza and salad were great.

name: Matthew Barcus
text: Took 2 hours to bring a burger out.  Had to ask for someone to take my order.  Had to ask several times for the status of my order.  Burger still wasn't right after it came to the table.  There were only 9 people in the restaurant so the service was unacceptable.  I wouldn't dine here again.

name: Ms Always Classy.
text: When he‚Äôs happy and smiling, that‚Äôs enough to give a great rating because we received excellent service for our lunch date.

name: Queen Warrior
text: WOW! I bought a "Lil" ceaser salad from here. $7.41 WITH NO MEAT!!!!! For that price, I can get an entire medium pizza at Bibs street pizza... I will ensure that no one I know comes to this money pit!

name: Vanessa Davidson
text: Pretty good eating. We split the bill and order whole pizza and wings.

name: Jason Kimball
text: My friends couldn't stop talking about mellow mushroom. I visited another location for the first time and was not that impressed. However, this location is fantastic. The staff are attentive and friendly and the food was delicious. I really enjoyed the menu selection and cool art work/vibe of the restaurant.

name: Melany Delgado
text: Great staff, eco-conscious, vegan friendly

name: Chardae P. Franklin
text: Delicious and friendly service!

name: Joshua Onuoha
text: A lot of the people were lazy and played around rather than did their jobs. Why girlfriend was cat called at the door by one of the employees which made her uncomfortable and one of the pizzas were burt. Luckily the person who served us ‚Ä¶More

name: Autumn Cannon
text: The place was clean.  There is a lot of seating and many windows for natural sunlight . The food was wonderful!

name: ahmaniel ben yehuda
text: I had an absolutely amazing experience at this spot. The service, provided by a gorgeous waitress with an incredible personality, was the best. She easily managed my party of 5 with a full dose of southern charm. ‚Ä¶More

name: Tony Serritelli
text: Mellow Mushroom was great...the entire staff was excellent...the food was exceptional but most importantly & why I would keep going back & recommend others to do the same was the service we received from our server & her name was Makena, best service & best server ever!!!

name: marco pendarvis
text:
Very pleasant atmosphere.
The staff members were very friendly.
The food was simply delicious.

name: Mike Lombardo
text: Good food, friendly staff.

name: Nicki Johnson
text: Great service. Great food!

name: Brian LeBrun
text: Great service and food! Pizza and calzones are excellent! And large variety of beers with a knowledgeable bartender and manager to help pick out good ones üçªüòÅ

name: Mark Stephens
text: Great pizza and drinks. Good service.

name: Odd Cosmonaut
text: Not only is this bartender the best in Montgomery he really connects with his guest. Perfect customer service is hard to come by and this mellow mushroom in Montgomery definitely has is. Heath is a hero and DESERVES a raise. I personally ‚Ä¶More

name: Abraham Tolbert
text: Service needs to improve,  but good good food.

name: Bobbi Posey
text: Great service, fantastic pizza!

name: Teddy Strong, Jr.
text: Pizza was great! Love the variety. Going back when I visit Montgomery!

name: Michael KLDE
text: Great Happy Hour (till 6:30). Excellent bartenders. Food is overpriced.

name: P Merriweather
text: Portobello mushroom hoagie was delicious. Although it was crowded with AFITC attendees service was quick

name: Aaron Pursell
text: Another great location that is that is Mellow Mushroom. The same service and food you would expect at any location. I love when I can never decide so I usually do half and half. Their Great White  and Cosmic Karma are fantastic. Be sure to study the beer list as they have many options. Their appetizers and desserts are always great.

name: Lydia Millington
text: Since we relocated this is our fun family weekend lunch place.  It's always clean and the staff if very courteous. A lil pricey but in a year she won't want to hang out with her mom.

name: Jeff Covington
text: Nice decor. Very attentive staff. Food was good.

name: Matthew Kozlowski
text: Food was good and service excellent. Just wished it wasn't so pricey!

name: Aisha McDonald
text: This place is delicious. The wings were not that great but you can't go wrong with any pizza you try.

name: Laura Stone
text: We love MM downtown Montgomery. We typically only eat the sweet Thai chili wings and the hummus and pita bread....delicious! And sitting at the bar is FAST service! The bartenders that are usually there most nights are friendly and know how to mix an awesome Moscow mule! They have a fairly good selection of beer on tap, too.

name: Ammi Embry
text: Aways thankful for soy free options while we're on the road. The calzone was delicious.

name: Megan Colyer
text: Great restaurant. Nice pet friendly patio and outdoor bar.

name: Jared Jones
text: I do love some dough from Mellow Mushroom but the thing that puts this one over the top is the service. Ended up going twice while I was in the city and both nights had amazing service between two different servers. They set a great standard of expectations for a restaurant like this and other locations should follow suit.

name: Aaron Fuller
text: Pretty pricy, but good pizza with dairy free and gluten free options as well

name: alex pudge
text: Great pizza with some cool combos 90s and 00's vibes

name: Fernanda Urrutia
text: I have ordered a sandwich that has ham and pepperoni an Italian hoagi.  I think that if I have asked for that, it is because I expected to find some ham even if it was not attached to me and delivered a sandwich only with lettuce and tomato.  The service is very good but the chefs already see that they are useless.

name: Charles Morris
text: What's a good atmosphere.   a little pricey bartender switch out why we were there  the new one that came on was not very friendly.  did not want to be there I don't think.   paid my bill and got out

name: el peka 13
text: Great customer service.

name: John Namias
text: Staff was very friendly from the time we walked in the door.  Food was tasty & delicious

name: Melissa Baines
text: Very rude and they got our order wrong! We eat at Mellows all over the US and this was not an excetable experience. :( we will be driving all the way to the Prattville location from now on.

name: Destiny Allen
text: Excellent food and service! First time in Montgomery,  AL and felt very welcome

name: Zane Hissom
text: Good for late night bites. Mellow mushroom has a wide selection of beer, although not as much local beers as I'd like.

name: LaTenia LaTin Indy's BreathMovement
text: Different, I will need to go again to determine.

name: Vincent
text: Good food and a good atmosphere. Servers are very attentive and will bring you what you need. Friendly people in a nice place to eat.

name: Robert Timothy Griffin
text: This place is awesome! The staff is very friendly and knowledgeable and the food is great too. If you are looking for a great atmosphere and tasty food this is a great place to visit.  Also if you are on a low carb diet they have crustless pizza. It's very easy to become a regular here.

name: Matthew Yarnold
text: Great Food and Service! I forgot my credit card and had left town before I realized it.They did everything they could to make sure I got my card back!

name: Tabaitha Dayley
text: Excellent food. The cook even made a special dish for my mother because she couldn't have bread. Super accommodating. Excellent waiter. Highly reccomend.

name: Ma Theresa Halog
text: Although the long wait because of the HOSA convention, the food was still great.

name: Brittany Williams
text: This is such an amazing place!! I came here to visit a friend and the service was wonderful. My daughter was with me and my friend as well. She loved the art and our server. Plus the food was AMAZING! We both got salads and a slice of pizza. Recommend this to anyone üíÜ

name: Caleb Sutton
text: Amazing pizza, super soft cookies, haven't had the burgers but I've had good things.  Military discount offered!!!  Coupons and discounts on orders over $25 ($5 off) pickup, delivery, dine in, and it's actually good.

name: Sherie Downton
text: I am not one who normally gives reviews and especially not a 5 star review, but I felt compelled after dining at this restaurant yesterday. Not only was the customer service superb, but so was the food. Our server was Matt. He was very ‚Ä¶More

name: Doug Treff
text: Fast, friendly service and good pizza

name: Drew C.
text: Good pizzas. Good lunch specials.

name: mekia
text: Friendly staff good food but that house salad and house dressing was amazing

name: Linda Lonich
text: Great food...pizza is so good.. Our waitresses was great also.

name: Denise Makris
text: Great pizza. Service was good too.

name: Curtis Davis
text: Great service by the staff! They kept my drink  refreshed, often.

name: Stewart Ebbinga
text: Despite having a large group for lunch the service was great. The loaded potato pizza was a nice surprise.

name: Thandolwethu Jele
text: Great pizza! All the pizzas, especially vegetarian pizzas.

name: Gilbert Family
text: Enjoyed my visit better today than a month ago.

name: Stephanie McDougal
text: Delicious pizza and drinks!

name: Tony Sanders
text: Great pizza

name: Emily Rogers
text: Always a good option while in Montgomery. I love their salads and pizzas. Friendly staff and good patio for larger groups.

name: Spencer Atkisson
text: Great gluten free pizza. Thick crust is great too.

name: Ellen H
text: 1st time visit at this location. Met a friend shortly after 11am & got a great parking spot at the front door. The service was friendly and quick. The spinach artichoke dip & Old School Jerk was very tasty. Will definitely go back!

name: Jasmine Downing
text: Joseph was our server / bartender. I can't put into words how personable and fantastic he was. He made a fabulous first impression of Mellow Mushroom. Our pizza that we put together came out perfect! We will definitely be back and sit at the bar if Joseph is working!!!!

name: Mr Bob
text: Friendly waitress and staff and lunch was served promptly

name: Adolfo Ortiz
text: Friendly service. Reasonable time. Delicious pizza with a good selection of beer

name: Bryan Holman
text: We LOVEüçï‚ù§Ô∏è this place!!!  Service is great at the bar side.... ask for Jacob or Debra!

name: keyla familia
text: Excellent food and service

name: Donna Osswald
text: great service and yummy!

name: Michelle Middleton
text: Good food. Horrible service.

name: art buff
text: Always consistent, excellent selection of beers.  Ate at the bar, bartenders were very friendly and engaging

name: Theresa Groves
text: Delicious! Great service and good food.

name: whynot aka. Mr. it ain't fair
text: Clean and the food was good

name: Yolanda Jones
text: Food was good, nice place to hang out

name: Benjamin C
text: Mellow mushroom is a bit overpriced but the pizza is very good, especially the crust. The only critique was the occasional unpleasantly large chunk of slimy onion, which was pretty offputting. The waiter was very affable and attentive, even ‚Ä¶More

name: Shag Harris
text: First I ordered some garlic cheese bread. It looked more like a large hot dog buns with cheese on it. I didn't even notice a hint of garlic. Then I ordered a pepperoni and sausage calzone with extra cheese. The amount of"toppings" was ‚Ä¶More

name: Deetra La'Rue
text: The food is always good and I always have my go to pizza, which is the Great White! The hummus is pretty good, as well as the wings. The vibe is reminiscent of New Orleans and I love the decorum.

name: JC Iungerman
text: Good food...nice staff...nice area
